title: Graph of deriv: segments and semicircle part - a

content.description: The function g is defined and differentiable on the closed interval [-7, 5] and satisfies g(0) = 5. The graph of y = g'(x), the derivative of g, consists of a semicircle and three line segments, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find g(3) and g(-2).

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
